summary: Diff clearly implements frontend Years management UI, Contracts year selection/filtering, load model changes (price/status/client/assignedTransporter) including a migration module, and a new earth-tone theme. The diff also includes several additional admin/contact-message and navigation-related UI changes not requested in the BuildRequest. Backend API-level fulfillment for some requirements (approved-loads-with-IDs API, years add/remove/list APIs, contract post/get changes) cannot be fully verified from the truncated `backend/main.mo` excerpt.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin contact-message details dialog with a (non-functional) delete button/flow
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention contact messages UI or deletion; this adds a new admin dialog and deletion UX that is explicitly noted as not implemented in backend.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin navigation link added to TopNav/Footer and admin auth/route-guard related UI adjustments (beyond the requested admin dashboard changes)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on load editing fields, approved loads IDs, years management, contracts year selection, and theming; it does not request adding Admin links in site navigation or additional admin route/auth guard behavior changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (TopNav Admin link, Footer Admin link, RequireAdmin changes, AccessDeniedScreen changes, useAuth changes)

hallucinated_features.description: Content updates to About/Services/Contact pages (regional coverage, contact details)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly states non-goal to redesign unrelated pages.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (AboutPage.tsx coverage update, ServicesPage.tsx coverage update, ContactPage.tsx contact details update)
